snippet.title: Steelrising | Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
King Louis XVI's automata army is terrorising the citizens of Paris. Join the Revolution as Aegis and fight against this reign of terror to try and change the course of history!

#Steelrising will release in June 2022 on PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam.

-------------------------------
Subscribe to Steelrising newsletter: https://www.steelrising.org
For updates about #Steelrising, you can follow us on: 

Facebook ► https://www.facebook.com/PlaySteelRising 
Instagram ► https://www.instagram.com/PlaySteelRising 
Twitter ►https://twitter.com/PlaySteelRising"
